metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16476 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: A Broken Access Control vulnerability in Active Job versions >= 4.2.0allows an attacker to craft user input which can cause Active Job todeserialize it using GlobalId and give them access to information that theyshould not have. This vulnerability has been fixed in versions 4.2.11,5.0.7.1, 5.1.6.1, and 5.2.1.1.

criterions.comment: rails package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
